== About Me ==
Hello, my name is Kev. I've been using Ubuntu on and off since 6.10, using it for everything from school projects to Java programming. I have experience in a number of different programming languages, however I still want to learn more! I've seen Ubuntu mature into a professional looking, popular distro and have helped many along the way.

==== IRC ====
I am often in IRC on various channels, please do not hesitate to message me via PM or via a message in the main channel with my nickname included with the message. I will be happy to help.

* #ubuntu-uk
* #ubuntu-youth
* #ubuntu-youth-council
* #lubuntu
* #RaspberryPi

=== Current Project & Goals ===
* Helping on IRC, Forums, and Launchpad

==== Future Plans & Projects ====
* Establish a greater presence within the Ubuntu community.
